messages.subject: My hacker was caught by the ISP
messages.msgSnippet: The Hacker s ISP took action against him. They can t tell me what action was taken, but they said according to their terms and conditions . I am assuming they
messages.messageBody:
The Hacker's ISP took action against him.
They can't tell me what action was taken, but they said "according to their terms and conditions".

I am assuming they dumped his account.

THey said the FBI can contact them and they will share information with them, and they can then share it with me. I feel kinda silly calling the FBI though!!

Kristen


****************************************************************

Today is even more important than tomorrow because "today" is a gift, and "tomorrow" might never come.

Today is where hope lives because today is when we can make things better than yesterday.

The only thing we can be sure of is today and life isn't worth living if it isn't lived in joy for as many moments of today as we can manage.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
